###### **Overview**

Computer systems engineering includes the science and technology of design, construction, implementation, and maintenance of software and components modern computing system hardware, equipment computer control and smart device networks. A Master of Science programme in computer systems engineering is thus available, which integrates expertise in software engineering, computer engineering, and systems engineering. This program will produce graduates who can work in a career related to the field of propulsion technology. They strive to improve equipment and current process by integrating the two software and hardware solutions to produce a stable system that includes an embedded system that equipped with security and software requirements.

[MQA](https://www2.mqa.gov.my/mqr/english/epapariptaAA.cfm?IDAkrKP=15032)

###### **Programme Educational Objectives**

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Proficient in imparting in-depth knowledge to solve problems critically and analytically in the field of computer systems engineering.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Career advancement through life-long learning and leadership qualities towards societal well-being.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Practice ethical principle and entrepreneurial mindset through good leadership involvement with community and organizations towards sustainable society.

###### **Learning Outcomes**

At the end of the programmed students are able to:

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Synthesize complex information, specialized concepts, theories and methods in the field of computer systems engineering.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Construct solutions to complex problems critically and integratively using systematic approaches.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Develop the latest practical and technical skills in computer system engineering project development.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Demonstrate the ability to collaborate with others and work effectively in a group/team.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Communicate effectively in conveying ideas, skills and knowledge using appropriate methods.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Use appropriate digital technologies and software to enhance work or practice in computer systems engineering.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Use appropriate mathematical models, statistical analysis techniques or numerical methods in computer system engineering projects.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Demonstrate autonomy and responsibility in leading projects.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Integrate independent and lifelong learning to support self-development.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Initiate entrepreneurial thinking and skills.

![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/fast-forward_4662135.png)Demonstrate adherence to ethical and professional codes of practice in executing work.

###### **Entry Requirements**

The normal requirement for admission to the programme is a four-year bachelor degree recognized by the university in either engineering or sciences.

[All Information](https://admission.utm.my/)

[Local Student](https://admission.utm.my/malaysian-postgraduate-study/)

[International Student](https://admission.utm.my/international-postgraduate-study/)
